name: "Special Analysis Zoom Lens"
desc:
A new type of Kamera accessory developed to enhance image recognition capabilities.

After equipping this accessory, a normal Kamera can quickly adjust its focus, allowing it to capture images of your travels so you can record precious memories at a moment's notice.

customize.text:
After activating the Special Analysis Zoom Lens through the Inventory or the Gadget Shortcut bar, you can use your Kamera to use a special photo-taking function.
<color=#ffe14b>After Charlotte activates this Gadget, the original effects of Framing: Freezing Point Composition's Hold Mode cannot take effect</color> , but you can use special methods to take photos...
